# UES Storage UX - Microsoft Intune Style Dashboard

## Project Overview
This is a comprehensive React TypeScript web interface for Unified Endpoint Storage (UES) management, built with Vite and styled after Microsoft Intune's modern interface design.

## Features
- **Dashboard**: Real-time storage metrics, device status overview, and system health monitoring
- **Device Management**: Comprehensive device listing, search, filtering, and bulk operations
- **Reports & Analytics**: Storage trend analysis, compliance tracking, and report generation
- **Settings**: System configuration, security policies, and notification preferences
- **Modern UI**: Microsoft Fluent-inspired design with responsive layouts

## Technology Stack
- React 18.3+ with TypeScript
- Vite build tool for fast development
- Recharts for data visualization
- Lucide React for consistent iconography
- CSS Custom Properties for theming

## Architecture
- Component-based architecture with TypeScript interfaces
- Centralized state management through React hooks
- Modular CSS with scoped component styles
- Responsive design with mobile-first approach

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript strict mode for type safety
- Follow React functional component patterns
- Implement proper error boundaries and loading states
- Maintain consistent naming conventions (PascalCase for components, camelCase for variables)
- Use semantic HTML and ARIA attributes for accessibility

## Code Quality
- ESLint configuration with React and TypeScript rules
- Consistent code formatting and style guidelines
- Component prop validation with TypeScript interfaces
- Error handling for async operations and API calls

## UI/UX Standards
- Follow Microsoft Fluent Design principles
- Use consistent color palette and typography
- Implement proper focus states and keyboard navigation
- Responsive breakpoints: mobile (768px), tablet (1024px), desktop (1200px+)

This project provides a professional-grade storage management interface suitable for enterprise environments.
